item.description:
Joomla! part deux - Mitch Pirtle (and several other Joomla! core team members) returns to Boston, exploring how simply and quickly one can get Joomla! 1.1 up and running, and then delve into the deeper mysteries of the CMS that promises a simple interface with powerful features. Covering templates, components, modules and mambots, you will learn additional tricks and tips to get the most out of your Joomla! site.

Optaros is located next to Boston Garden. There are NO events scheduled so parking should not be a problem. Take the Commuter Rail or the Green or Orange Line to North Station

For more information, see http://www.BostonPHP....
item.name: Boston PHP Meetup April Meetup
